column4: so apparently anything named .cgwdtheme is incompatible with compiz-fusion or what
and still no go with my damn themes!
i want to cry so bad
if anyone has a block of ice,  you can throw it at my face now
ive seriously been configuring this computer for the past 6-7 hours
Do you have emerald theme manager installed?
Install it with Applications -> Add /Remove or Synaptic / apt
Compiz doesn't use Emerald by default, you probably just need to start emerald
Also I think that you can switch to it with the Compiz Fusion icon in the panel
There is a GUI setting for it somewhere ( again, I think in the icon in the top panel ) but if you want to do it manually just add "emerald --replace" to System -> Preferences -> Session
I have not used Compiz Fusion yet but in Beryl there was an icon in the top panel, I think it is now called "fusion-icon"
